section.name: ToolWindow
section.p: A Tool Window is a secondary window used to provide one or more particular functionalities.

td.p: To register a tool window use the following:
td.source: ToolWindowManager toolWindowManager = new ...; ToolWindow toolwindow = toolWindowManager. registerToolWindow("Title 1", // Tool Window identifier "Title 1", // Tool Window Title icon, // Tool Window Icon component, // Tool Window component ToolWindowAnchor.LEFT) // Tool Window anchor
td.p: When you register a tool window you obtain an instance of ToolWindow interface. This interface is the main entry point to modify tool window properties. Moreover there are methods to make the tool available, visible and active.
